author.name: Christian (moonstar-x)
author.bio: Hi there, my name is Christian, also known as moonstar-x online. I write about the things I enjoy most about software development. Hope you enjoy (at least some) of my writing!

author.name: Christian (moonstar-x)
author.bio: Hi there, my name is Christian, also known as moonstar-x online. I enjoy working on a variety of diverse projects, from implementing artistic ideas, contributing in some way to scientific research, or creating simple applications that people can use. I hope you enjoy reading about these projects as much as I enjoy building them!
